Authorization.acceptPrivacyPolicyError: You must accept the privacy policy
Authorization.termsText:
1. General Provisions

These terms and conditions govern the use of the translation service ("Service") offered by Suliko LLC (hereinafter - "Company", "we"). By accessing or using the Service, you as a user ("User") agree to the terms of this document.

2. User Obligations

When using the Service, you are obligated to use it only for legal purposes and not violate applicable laws.

It is prohibited to use the Service to create, distribute, or transmit any harmful or illegal content.

3. Intellectual Property

You retain ownership of the text you upload to the Service. By using the Service, you grant the Company a limited, non-exclusive license to process and use this text solely for performing and improving the translation service.

The Service, all its components, software, design, and other materials constitute the intellectual property of the Company and are protected by copyright.

4. Limitation of Liability

The Service is provided "as is" without any warranty. The Company makes no guarantee that the Service will be uninterrupted, error-free, or secure.

The Company is not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or other damages caused by the use of the Service.

5. Service Termination

The Company has the right to restrict or terminate user access to the Service at any time and for any reason if the user violates these terms and conditions.

6. Changes

The Company reserves the right to make changes to these terms and conditions at any time. Changes take effect immediately upon posting on the website or application.
Authorization.privacyText:
1. Information Collection

Information You Provide: We collect the text that you upload for using the translation service.

Technical and Usage Data: We may collect information about your device, IP address, browser type, and service usage (e.g., translation frequency, languages used) for analytics and service improvement.

2. Information Usage

Collected information is used for the following purposes:

To perform the translation service.

To improve the service and adapt it to your needs.

For analytics on how users use the service.

To resolve technical issues and ensure security.

3. Data Security

We employ reasonable administrative, technical, and physical measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

4. Your Rights

You have the right to request access to, correction, or deletion of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us.

5. Data Retention

We will retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy.

AboutSection.title: Why Choose Suliko?
AboutSection.missionText: Suliko empowers translators to earn 3-10x more by accelerating their workflow. We're not replacing translators—we're their intelligent assistant that handles the heavy lifting while you focus on quality and expertise. Work with confidence using our split-screen proofreading interface, get intelligent suggestions to improve translation quality, and export your work in Word, PDF, or plain text formats. Every translation benefits from AI-assisted refinement while maintaining your professional touch.

video.title: See Suliko in Action
video.description: Discover how Suliko works and why professionals worldwide choose it for their translation needs.

aiPowered.title: Translator's Copilot
aiPowered.description: Suliko empowers translators to earn 3-10x more by accelerating their workflow. We're not replacing translators—we're their intelligent assistant.

security.title: Split-Screen Editing
security.description: Work with confidence using our split-screen proofreading interface. Compare original and translated content side-by-side for perfect translations.

speed.title: Smart Suggestions & Export
speed.description: Get intelligent suggestions to improve translation quality, then export your work in Word, PDF, or plain text formats with professional-grade results.

TestimonialsSection.title: What Our Customers Say
TestimonialsSection.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Suliko for their translation needs

cta.title: Ready to Join Them?
cta.subtitle: Start your free trial today and experience the difference professional translation can make.

translationHouse.name: თარგმნის სახლი
translationHouse.content: Suliko has transformed our translation workflow. The advanced accuracy combined with professional quality has helped us serve our clients better and faster. It's become an essential tool for our agency.

irakliVekua.name: ირაკლი ვეკუა
irakliVekua.content: As a business owner dealing with international partners, Suliko has been invaluable. The document translation quality is exceptional, and the speed allows us to respond quickly to business opportunities.

iuristi.name: Iuristi.ge Team
iuristi.content: Legal document translation requires absolute precision. Suliko's accuracy in translating complex legal terminology and maintaining context has been outstanding. It's revolutionized our legal document processing.

nebulaAI.name: Nebula AI Hub
nebulaAI.content: Working in technology, we appreciate the sophistication of Suliko's translation engine. The quality and reliability have exceeded our expectations, making it our go-to solution for technical document translation.

LandingFooter.description: The world's most advanced translation platform. Breaking down language barriers with precision, speed, and reliability.
